Block.ODPCS126_overridden:WhereClause:
misc_type = 'TRAVEL'
and (slip_no = :parameter.p_ispt_no or :parameter.p_ispt_no is null)
and (SF_PCS_0104(psn_id, :PARAMETER.USER_CODE) = 'Y' or
 SF_PCS_0104(supply_code,:PARAMETER.USER_CODE) = 'Y' or
 SF_PCS_0104(entry_user, :PARAMETER.USER_CODE) = 'Y')
and nvl(travel_flag,'N')='N'

Trigger.ODPCS126_overridden:TriggerText: :global.begin_date := trunc(:b1pcs1005.begin_date);

declare
 lv_char varchar2(10);
begin 

 if :b1pcs1005.entry_program not like 'ODPCS%' then --Add for 2011FIN015- by Flora at 20110826
 if :global.begin_date != trunc(:b1pcs1005.begin_date,'dd') then
 s_alert('3','',lv_char); 
 :b1pcs1005.begin_date:= :global.begin_date ;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 if :b1pcs1005.end_date is not null and :b1pcs1005.end_date < :b1pcs1005.begin_date then
 s_alert('3','!!!',lv_char);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 --Add for 2011FIN015- by Eden at 20110805
 if :b1pcs1005.begin_date is not null and :b1pcs1005.end_date is not null then
 p_validate_timer_1;
 end if;
 --End for 2011FIN015-

exception
 when form_trigger_failure then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin B2PCS1006 detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B1PCS1005.SLIP_NO is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B1PCS1005.B1PCS1005_B2PCS1006'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B2PCS1006'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B2PCS1006 detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B3PCS1015 detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B1PCS1005.SLIP_NO is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B1PCS1005.B1PCS1005_B3PCS1015'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B3PCS1015'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B3PCS1015 detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin B2PCS1006 detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B2PCS1006_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PCS1006 P 
 WHERE P.SLIP_NO = :B1PCS1005.SLIP_NO;
 --
 -- End B2PCS1006 detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B3PCS1015 detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B3PCS1015_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM pcs1015 p 
 WHERE p.SLIP_NO = :B1PCS1005.SLIP_NO;
 --
 -- End B3PCS1015 detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin B2PCS1006 detail program section
 --
 OPEN B2PCS1006_cur; 
 FETCH B2PCS1006_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B2PCS1006_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B2PCS1006_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B2PCS1006_cur;
 --
 -- End B2PCS1006 detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B3PCS1015 detail program section
 --
 OPEN B3PCS1015_cur; 
 FETCH B3PCS1015_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B3PCS1015_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B3PCS1015_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B3PCS1015_cur;
 --
 -- End B3PCS1015 detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

declare
 cursor c1 is
 select user_name
 from v_pcs_1091
 where supply_code = :b1pcs1005.psn_id;
 
 cursor c_department_name (c_code varchar2) is 
 select name_c 
 from sec1001
 where department_code =c_code;
 
 cursor c3 is
 select nvl(name_c,name_e) dept_name
 from sec1001
 where department_code = :b1pcs1005.department_code;
 cursor c4 is
 select sum(usd_amount),sum(std_amount),sum(tax_usd_amount),sum(tax_std_amount)
 from pcs1015
 where slip_no = :b1pcs1005.slip_no;
 
 cursor c5 is
 select position_name,
 user_name
 from v_pcs_1091
 where supply_code = :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 
 cursor c6 is
 select name user_name
 from v_pcs_1092
 where supply_code = :b1pcs1005.supply_code; 
 v_c1 c1%rowtype;
 v6 varchar2(32);
 p_position varchar2(100);
 p_user_name varchar2(100);
begin
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into :b1pcs1005.psn_name;
 close c1;
 open c5; 
 fetch c5 into p_position,p_user_name;
 if c5%found then 
 :b1pcs1005.position := p_position;
 :b1pcs1005.supply_name := p_user_name;
 end if;
 
 if :b1pcs1005.supply_name is null then
 open c6;
 fetch c6 into v6;
 close c6;
 :b1pcs1005.supply_name :=v6;
 end if;
 
 close c5;
 open c3;
 fetch c3 into :b1pcs1005.dept_name;
 close c3;
 open c4;
 fetch c4 into :b1pcs1005.f_inv_usd_amount,:b1pcs1005.f_inv_std_amount,:b1pcs1005.f_inv_tax_usd_amount,:b1pcs1005.f_inv_tax_std_amount;
 close c4;
 
 if :b1pcs1005.department_code is not null then 
 open c_department_name(:b1pcs1005.department_code);
 fetch c_department_name into :b1pcs1005.dept_name;
 close c_department_name;
 end if;
begin
select sum(nvl(amt,0))
 into :b1pcs1005.total_amt
 from (select sum(decode(nvl(dc_type,'D'),'D',1,'C',-1)*nvl(std_amount,0)) amt
 from pcs1006
 where slip_no = :b1pcs1005.slip_no
 union all
 select sum(nvl(tax_std_amount,0)) amt
 from pcs1015
 where slip_no = :b1pcs1005.slip_no);
exception
 when no_data_found then
 null;
end;
end;

declare
 lv_now_rec number;
 lv_tot_rec number;
 lv_idx number;
begin
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 delete_record;
 else
 delete_record;
 lv_now_rec := :system.trigger_record;
 last_record;
 lv_tot_rec := :system.trigger_record;
 
 for lv_idx in lv_now_rec .. lv_tot_rec loop
 go_record(lv_idx);
 :b2pcs1006.line_no := lv_idx;
 end loop;
 
 go_record(lv_now_rec);
 end if;

 p_payable_amt;

end;

declare
 lv_now_rec number;
 lv_tot_rec number;
 lv_idx number;
begin
 if :system.last_record != 'TRUE' then
 lv_now_rec := :system.trigger_record;
 last_record;
 lv_tot_rec := :system.trigger_record;
 for lv_idx in lv_now_rec + 1..lv_tot_rec loop
 go_record(lv_idx);
 :b2pcs1006.line_no := lv_idx + 1;
 end loop;
 go_record(lv_now_rec);
 create_record;
 else
 create_record;
 end if;
end;

declare

 lv_char varchar(10);
 lv_alert varchar2(10);
begin

 /*2006/11/29 Keynes add for acount_flag = 'Y' */
 if :b1pcs1005.audit_flag = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3', '!!', lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 :b2pcs1006.entry_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b2pcs1006.entry_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b2pcs1006.entry_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b2pcs1006.entry_program := :form_id_display;
 :b2pcs1006.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b2pcs1006.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b2pcs1006.modify_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b2pcs1006.modify_program := :form_id_display;

 if :b2pcs1006.expense_user is null then
 :b2pcs1006.expense_user := :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 end if;

 if :b2pcs1006.curr = sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR') then
 :b2pcs1006.amount := round(:b2pcs1006.std_amount);
 :b2pcs1006.std_amount := round(:b2pcs1006.std_amount);
 end if;

 :b2pcs1006.std_amount := round(:b2pcs1006.std_amount);

 if :b1pcs1005.misc_sub_type in ('3', '4') then
 :b2pcs1006.expense_user := :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 else
 :b2pcs1006.expense_user := :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 end if;

 p_payable_amt;

 --2009.02.19
 if :b2pcs1006.budget_code is not null then
 p_get_budget_amount;
 select nvl(:b2pcs1006.budget_amount,0) - nvl(:b2pcs1006.std_amount,0)*decode(:b2pcs1006.dc_type,'C',-1,1)
 into :b2pcs1006.budget_amount from dual;
 else
 :b2pcs1006.budget_amount := null;
 end if;

end;

declare

 lv_char varchar(10);
 lv_alert varchar2(1);
begin

 /*2006/11/29 Keynes add for acount_flag = 'Y' */
 if :b1pcs1005.audit_flag = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3', '!!', lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 :b2pcs1006.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b2pcs1006.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b2pcs1006.modify_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b2pcs1006.modify_program := :form_id_display;

 if :b2pcs1006.expense_user is null then
 :b2pcs1006.expense_user := :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 end if;

 if :b1pcs1005.misc_sub_type in ('3', '4') then
 :b2pcs1006.expense_user := :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 else
 :b2pcs1006.expense_user := :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 end if;

 if :b2pcs1006.curr = sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR') then
 :b2pcs1006.amount := round(:b2pcs1006.std_amount);
 :b2pcs1006.std_amount := round(:b2pcs1006.std_amount);
 end if;

 :b2pcs1006.std_amount := round(:b2pcs1006.std_amount);
 p_payable_amt;

 --2009.02.19
 if :b2pcs1006.budget_code is not null then
 p_get_budget_amount;
 if (nvl(:b2pcs1006.new_item,' ') != nvl(:b2pcs1006.o_new_item,' ') or
 (sf_pcs_0074(:b2pcs1006.new_item, nvl(:b2pcs1006.month_date,:b1pcs1005.slip_date)) = 'Y' and
 to_char(nvl(:b2pcs1006.month_date,:b1pcs1005.slip_date),'yyyymm') != to_char(nvl(:b2pcs1006.o_month_date,:b1pcs1005.slip_date),'yyyymm')) or
 (sf_pcs_0074(:b2pcs1006.new_item, nvl(:b2pcs1006.month_date,:b1pcs1005.slip_date)) = 'N' and
 to_char(nvl(:b2pcs1006.month_date,:b1pcs1005.slip_date),'yyyy') != to_char(nvl(:b2pcs1006.o_month_date,:b1pcs1005.slip_date),'yyyy')) or
 nvl(:b2pcs1006.budget_code,' ') != nvl(:b2pcs1006.o_budget_code,' ')
 ) then
 select nvl(:b2pcs1006.budget_amount, 0)
 - nvl(:b2pcs1006.std_amount, 0) * decode(:b2pcs1006.dc_type, 'C', -1, 1)
 into :b2pcs1006.budget_amount
 from dual;
 else
 select nvl(:b2pcs1006.budget_amount, 0)
 - nvl(:b2pcs1006.std_amount, 0) * decode(:b2pcs1006.dc_type, 'C', -1, 1)
 + nvl(:b2pcs1006.o_std_amount, 0) * decode(:b2pcs1006.o_dc_type, 'C', -1, 1)
 into :b2pcs1006.budget_amount
 from dual;
 end if;
 else
 :b2pcs1006.budget_amount := null; 
 end if;

end;

declare
 cursor c2 is
 select '*'
 from bgs1022
 where new_item = :b2pcs1006.new_item
 and year = to_number(to_char(:b1pcs1005.slip_date,'yyyy'))
 --and code = :b2pcs1006.budget_code
 and code in (:b2pcs1006.budget_code, '@') --2009.11.24
 and quantity_type = '*'
 and price_type = '*'
 and nvl(apply_amt,0) > nvl(sum_amt,0);
v_c1 varchar2(100);
v_c2 varchar2(100);
lov_alert varchar2(1);
v_error exception;
begin
 open c2;
 fetch c2 into v_c2;
 if c2%found then
 s_alert('2',sf_gls_0001(30011),lov_alert);
 if lov_alert = 'Y' then
 null;
 else
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 close c2;
 
 --2009.02.19 save old value for compare
 :b2pcs1006.o_new_item := :b2pcs1006.new_item;
 :b2pcs1006.o_month_date := :b2pcs1006.month_date;
 :b2pcs1006.o_budget_code := :b2pcs1006.budget_code;
 :b2pcs1006.o_std_amount := :b2pcs1006.std_amount;
 :b2pcs1006.o_dc_type := :b2pcs1006.dc_type;
 
exception
 when v_error then
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 message(sqlerrm);
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

DECLARE
 CURSOR C_GLG1012 (p_new_item VARCHAR2)
 IS SELECT REF_TYPE1,
 REF_TYPE2,
 REF_TYPE3,
 REF_TYPE4,
 REF_TYPE5
 FROM GLG1012
 WHERE NEW_ITEM=p_new_item;

 REC_GLG1012 C_GLG1012%ROWTYPE;
 v_new_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_message VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL;
 v_prompt VARCHAR2(200);
 v_master VARCHAR2(200);
 v_relation VARCHAR2(200);
 lv_alert varchar2(1);
 
 it_id Item;
 v_master_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_detail_item VARCHAR2(200);
 

BEGIN
 if :b2pcs1006.expense_user is null then
 :b2pcs1006.expense_user := :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 end if;
 if (:b2pcs1006.amount is null or :b2pcs1006.amount =0) then
 s_alert('1','amount can''t be zero',lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 v_relation := get_block_property(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK,first_detail_relation);
 if v_relation is not null then
 v_master :=get_relation_property(v_relation,master_name);
 end if; 
 v_new_item:=NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.NEW_ITEM');
 OPEN C_GLG1012(v_new_item);
 FETCH C_GLG1012 INTO REC_GLG1012;
 IF C_GLG1012%NOTFOUND THEN
 BELL;
 s_alert('1','NO SUCH NEW ITEM:'||v_new_item||' DEFINED IN GLG1012',lv_alert);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 
 --REF1
 IF ID_NULL(FIND_ITEM(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1)) THEN
 v_detail_item:='NOT EXISTS REF';
 v_prompt:=NULL;
 ELSE
 v_detail_item:= NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1);
 v_prompt:=GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1,PROMPT_TEXT);
 END IF;
 IF ID_NULL(FIND_ITEM(v_master||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1)) THEN
 v_master_item:='NOT EXISTS REF';
 v_prompt:=NULL;
 ELSE
 v_master_item:= NAME_IN(v_master||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1);
 IF v_prompt IS NULL THEN
 v_prompt:=GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_master||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1,PROMPT_TEXT);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 IF v_prompt IS NULL THEN
 v_prompt:=REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1;
 END IF;
 IF REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE1 IS NOT NULL AND
 (
 (v_detail_item IS NULL AND v_master_item IS NULL)
 OR
 (v_detail_item='NOT EXISTS REF' AND v_master_item='NOT EXISTS REF')
 OR
 (v_detail_item='NOT EXISTS REF' AND v_master_item IS NULL)
 OR
 (v_detail_item IS NULL AND v_master_item='NOT EXISTS REF')
 ) THEN

 v_message:=v_message||v_prompt||',';

 END IF;
 
 --REF2
 IF ID_NULL(FIND_ITEM(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2)) THEN
 v_detail_item:='NOT EXISTS REF';
 v_prompt:=NULL;
 ELSE
 v_detail_item:= NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2);
 v_prompt:=GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2,PROMPT_TEXT);
 END IF;
 IF ID_NULL(FIND_ITEM(v_master||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2)) THEN
 v_master_item:='NOT EXISTS REF';
 v_prompt:=NULL;
 ELSE
 v_master_item:= NAME_IN(v_master||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2);
 IF v_prompt IS NULL THEN
 v_prompt:=GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_master||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2,PROMPT_TEXT);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 IF v_prompt IS NULL THEN
 v_prompt:=REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2;
 END IF;

 IF REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE2 IS NOT NULL AND
 (
 (v_detail_item IS NULL AND v_master_item IS NULL)
 OR

 --REF3
 IF ID_NULL(FIND_ITEM(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE3)) THEN

 IF v_prompt IS NULL THEN

 END IF;
 END IF;
 IF v_prompt IS NULL THEN

 IF REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE3 IS NOT NULL AND
 (

 --REF4
 IF ID_NULL(FIND_ITEM(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE4)) THEN

 IF REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE4 IS NOT NULL AND
 (

 OR
 (v_detail_item='NOT EXISTS REF' AND v_master_item='NOT EXISTS REF')

 ELSE

 END IF;
 IF ID_NULL(FIND_ITEM(v_master||'.'||REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE5)) THEN
 v_master_item:='NOT EXISTS REF';

 ELSE

 IF REC_GLG1012.REF_TYPE5 IS NOT NULL AND

 OR

 ) THEN

 IF v_message is NOT NULL THEN

 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
END;

DECLARE
 cursor c1
 is 
 select nvl(subtype,'*') subtype,nation_code
 from pcs1012
 where supply_code=nvl(:b3pcs1015.cust_code,:b1pcs1005.supply_code);
 v1 c1%rowtype; 
BEGIN
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into v1;
 close c1; 
:parameter.p_invoice_format := 21;
:parameter.p_cut_type := 1; 
:parameter.p_tax_type := 1;

 if v1.subtype='EMPLOYEE' then
 if :b3pcs1015.reg_no is null then
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='ABROAD_RECEIPT' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :='11111111';
 elsif :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='RECEIPT' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :='00000000';
 elsif :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='OTHERS' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :='00000000';
 end if; 
 end if;
 elsif v1.subtype !='EMPLOYEE' and v1.nation_code='TW' then
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='ABROAD_RECEIPT' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :='00000000';
 elsif :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='RECEIPT' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :='00000000';
 elsif :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='OTHERS' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :='00000000';
 end if; 
 elsif v1.subtype='EMPLOYEE' and v1.nation_code !='TW' then
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='ABROAD_RECEIPT' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :=nvl(:b3pcs1015.cust_code,:b1pcs1005.supply_code);
 elsif :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='RECEIPT' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :=nvl(:b3pcs1015.cust_code,:b1pcs1005.supply_code);
 elsif :b3pcs1015.invoice_type='OTHERS' then
 :b3pcs1015.reg_no :=nvl(:b3pcs1015.cust_code,:b1pcs1005.supply_code);
 end if; 
 end if;
 
 /*Amend for 2011FIN015- by Eden at 20110805
 if :b3pcs1015.amount != 0 then

 :b3pcs1015.std_amount := round(nvl(:b3pcs1015.usd_amount,0) * nvl(:b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate,0),sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR')));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(:b3pcs1015.curr));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.usd_amount * nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('EX_CURR'))));
 end if;*/

declare
 lv_alert varchar2(1);
 v_length number;

 cursor c2 is select subtype,nation_code
 from pcs1012
 where supply_code=:b3pcs1015.cust_code; 
 
 cursor c3 is select supply_code,reg_no,nation_code,subtype
 from pcs1012
 where supply_code=:b3pcs1015.cust_code; 

 v_subtype varchar2(32);
 v_reg_no varchar2(32); 
 v_nation_code varchar2(32);
 v_supply_code varchar2(32); 
begin 
 if :b3pcs1015.source_type ='SOCIAL'then
 if length(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) !=8 then
 s_alert('3','8',lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 else 
 return;
 end if;
 end if;
 
 open c2;
 fetch c2 into v_subtype,v_nation_code;
 close c2;
 if v_subtype='EMPLOYEE' and :b3pcs1015.invoice_type in ('RECEIPT','OTHERS') then
 
 if :b3pcs1015.reg_no='00000000' then
 return;
 else
 if not sf_pcs_0013(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then 
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 /* if not sf_pcs_0048(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert);
 end if;*/ 
 end if;
 
 elsif v_subtype='EMPLOYEE' and :b3pcs1015.invoice_type ='ABROAD_RECEIPT' then 
 if :b3pcs1015.reg_no='11111111' then
 return;
 else
 if :b3pcs1015.reg_no is not null then
 if not sf_pcs_0013(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then 
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 /* if not sf_pcs_0048(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;*/
 end if; 
 end if;
 
 
 elsif v_subtype='EMPLOYEE' and :b3pcs1015.invoice_type ='INVOICE' then
 
 
 if :b3pcs1015.reg_no is not null then
 if not sf_pcs_0013(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then 
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 /* if not sf_pcs_0048(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;*/
 end if; 
 
 end if ;
 v_supply_code :=null;
 v_reg_no :=null;
 v_nation_code :=null;
 v_subtype :=null;
 open c3;
 fetch c3 into v_supply_code,v_reg_no,v_nation_code,v_subtype; 
 close c3;
 if v_nation_code !='TW' and v_subtype !='EMPLOYEE' then 
 
 if sf_pcs_0048(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) ='Y' or sf_pcs_0053(:b3pcs1015.reg_no)='Y' then
 return;
 end if; 
 
 if not sf_pcs_0013(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then 
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 /* if not sf_pcs_0048(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert);
 end if; */
 
 elsif v_nation_code ='TW' and v_subtype !='EMPLOYEE' then 
 
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type in ('RECEIPT','OTHERS','ABROAD_RECEIPT') then 
 if :b3pcs1015.reg_no='00000000' then
 return;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 
 if :b3pcs1015.reg_no is not null then 
 if not sf_pcs_0013(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then 
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 /* if not sf_pcs_0048(:b3pcs1015.reg_no) then
 s_alert('3','',lv_alert);
 end if;*/
 end if; 
 end if;
 
 exception
 when form_trigger_failure then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
end;

declare
 cursor c1 is 
 select desc_c from pcs1016
 where code_id=:b3pcs1015.invoice_format
 and code_type='INVOICE_FORMAT';
 lv_alert varchar2(1);
 v_1 varchar2(200);
begin
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into v_1;
 close c1;
 message(v_1);
/*P_POP_LIST('B1ARC1002.CUT_TYPE',
 'SELECT DESC_C REMARK,
 CODE_ID CODE_ID
 FROM PCS1016 A
 WHERE A.CODE_TYPE = ''CUT_TYPE''
 ORDER BY CODE_ID');
P_POP_LIST('B1ARC1002.TAX_TYPE',
 'SELECT DESC_C REMARK,
 CODE_ID CODE_ID
 FROM PCS1016 A
 WHERE A.CODE_TYPE = ''TAX_TYPE''
 ORDER BY CODE_ID');*/
 
end;

if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type in ('RECEIPT','ABROAD_RECEIPT') then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount := 0;
end if;

declare
 cursor c1 is 
 select desc_c from pcs1016
 where code_id=:b3pcs1015.cut_type
 and code_type='CUT_TYPE';
 lv_alert varchar2(1);
 v_1 varchar2(200);
begin
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into v_1;
 close c1;
 message(v_1);
 
/*P_POP_LIST('B1ARC1002.CUT_TYPE',
 'SELECT DESC_C REMARK,
 CODE_ID CODE_ID
 FROM PCS1016 A
 WHERE A.CODE_TYPE = ''CUT_TYPE''
 ORDER BY CODE_ID');
P_POP_LIST('B1ARC1002.TAX_TYPE',
 'SELECT DESC_C REMARK,
 CODE_ID CODE_ID
 FROM PCS1016 A
 WHERE A.CODE_TYPE = ''TAX_TYPE''
 ORDER BY CODE_ID');*/
 
end;

if :b3pcs1015.cut_type in ('3','4') then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount :=0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount :=0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount :=0;
end if;

if :b3pcs1015.cut_type in ('1','2') then
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type in ('INVOICE','OTHERS') then
 if :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate is not null and :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate is not null and :b3pcs1015.amount is not null and :b3pcs1015.curr is not null then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount :=round(:b3pcs1015.amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(:b3pcs1015.curr));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.amount/:b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('EX_CURR')))*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0);
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount:=round(:b3pcs1015.std_amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_0007));
 elsif :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate is null and :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate is null then 
 if :b3pcs1015.curr=sf_ars_0007 then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount :=round(:b3pcs1015.amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(:b3pcs1015.curr));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount :=null;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount :=ROUND(:b3pcs1015.tax_amount);
 elsif :b3pcs1015.curr !=sf_ars_0007 then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount :=null;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount :=null; 
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
end if;

declare
 cursor c1 is 
 select desc_c from pcs1016
 where code_id=:b3pcs1015.tax_type
 and code_type='TAX_TYPE';
 lv_alert varchar2(1);
 v_1 varchar2(200);
begin
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into v_1;
 close c1;
 message(v_1);
/*P_POP_LIST('B1ARC1002.CUT_TYPE',
 'SELECT DESC_C REMARK,
 CODE_ID CODE_ID
 FROM PCS1016 A
 WHERE A.CODE_TYPE = ''CUT_TYPE''
 ORDER BY CODE_ID');
P_POP_LIST('B1ARC1002.TAX_TYPE',
 'SELECT DESC_C REMARK,
 CODE_ID CODE_ID
 FROM PCS1016 A
 WHERE A.CODE_TYPE = ''TAX_TYPE''
 ORDER BY CODE_ID');*/
 
end;

if :b3pcs1015.tax_type in ('2','3') then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount :=0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount :=0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount :=0;
end if;

if :b3pcs1015.tax_type = '1' then
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type in ('INVOICE','OTHERS') then
 if :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate is not null and :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate is not null and :b3pcs1015.amount is not null and :b3pcs1015.curr is not null then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount :=round(:b3pcs1015.amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(:b3pcs1015.curr));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.amount/:b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('EX_CURR')))*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0);

declare
cursor c1 is select arc1002_id
 from arc1002
 where track_invoice=:b3pcs1015.track_invoice;
v_arc1002_id number;
v_temp varchar2(2);
v_tblndx binary_integer;
lv_alert varchar2(2);

begin
 /*2006/11/29 Keynes add for acount_flag = 'Y' */
 if :b1pcs1005.audit_flag = 'Y' then 
 s_alert('1','!!',lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if ; 
 
 if :b3pcs1015.curr =sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR') then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount :=round(:b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR')));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount :=:b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount;
 :b3pcs1015.std_amount :=round(:b3pcs1015.std_amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR')));
 :b3pcs1015.amount :=:b3pcs1015.std_amount; 
 end if; 
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount :=round(:b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR')));
 :b3pcs1015.std_amount :=round(:b3pcs1015.std_amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR'))); 
if :b3pcs1015.track_invoice is null then
 :b3pcs1015.track_invoice := sf_ars_0012('RECEIPT',SYSDATE);
end if;
 if :b3pcs1015.source_type='SOCIAL' and :b3pcs1015.cut_type !='3' then
 s_alert('3','source_type ,!!',lv_alert);
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type not in ('RECEIPT','ABROAD_RECEIPT') then
 :b3pcs1015.cut_type :='3';
 else 
 :b3pcs1015.cut_type := null; 
 end if; 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
:b3pcs1015.entry_date := sf_ars_0001;
:b3pcs1015.entry_user := :parameter.user_code;
:b3pcs1015.entry_office := :parameter.office_code;
:b3pcs1015.entry_program := :form_id_display;
:b3pcs1015.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;
:b3pcs1015.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;
:b3pcs1015.modify_office := :parameter.office_code;
:b3pcs1015.modify_program := :form_id_display;
:b3pcs1015.slip_ref_no := :b3pcs1015.slip_no;
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into v_arc1002_id;
 if c1%notfound then
 select arc1002_arc1002_id.nextval 
 into v_arc1002_id
 from dual;
 INSERT INTO ARC1002
 ( ARC1002_ID,TRACK_INVOICE , TRACK_ID , INVOICE_NO ,INVOICE_DATE 
 , REG_NO , TAX_TYPE , CURR , INVOICE_FORMAT , CUST_CODE
 , CUT_TYPE , INVOICE_TYPE , ENTRY_USER ,
 ENTRY_OFFICE , ENTRY_DATE , ENTRY_PROGRAM , MODIFY_USER
 , MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_OFFICE , MODIFY_PROGRAM , ARC1002_TYPE 
 , SLIP_NO ,SOURCE_TYPE 
 , AREA_CODE,add_type
 )
 values ( V_ARC1002_ID,:b3pcs1015.TRACK_INVOICE , :b3pcs1015.TRACK_ID , :b3pcs1015.INVOICE_NO ,
 :b3pcs1015.INVOICE_DATE , 
 :b3pcs1015.REG_NO , :b3pcs1015.TAX_TYPE ,:b3pcs1015.CURR , :b3pcs1015.INVOICE_FORMAT ,
 :b3pcs1015.CUST_CODE,:b3pcs1015.CUT_TYPE ,
 :b3pcs1015.INVOICE_TYPE , :b3pcs1015.ENTRY_USER ,:b3pcs1015.ENTRY_OFFICE ,:b3pcs1015.ENTRY_DATE,
 :b3pcs1015.ENTRY_PROGRAM ,:b3pcs1015.MODIFY_USER,:b3pcs1015.MODIFY_DATE,:b3pcs1015.MODIFY_OFFICE,
 :b3pcs1015.MODIFY_PROGRAM,'BUY',:b3pcs1015.SLIP_NO ,
 :b3pcs1015.SOURCE_TYPE ,
 :b3pcs1015.AREA_CODE,
 :b3pcs1015.add_type);
 :b3pcs1015.arc1002_id:=v_arc1002_id; 
 else
 s_alert(1,': '||:b3pcs1015.invoice_no||' !! ... ',lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 p_payable_amt;
 
exception 
 when dup_val_on_index then
 s_alert(1,': '||:b3pcs1015.invoice_no||' !! ... ',lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 s_alert('3',sqlerrm,lv_alert);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

declare
 lv_help_file varchar2(150);
 lv_char varchar2(1);
begin
 begin
 select t.desc_e
 into lv_help_file
 from pcs1016 t
 where t.code_type = 'PATH'
 and t.code_id = :form_id_display
 and t.code_value1 = 'HELP';
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 lv_help_file := :form_id_display || '.doc';
 end;

 if not D2k_Finder.FileExists(lv_help_file) then
 s_alert(1,'Help file not found! '||lv_help_file, lv_char);
 else
 open_ext_file(lv_help_file);
 end if;

end;

declare
 cursor c1 is select reg_no
 from pcs1012
 where supply_code = :b1pcs1005.supply_code; 
 pl_id paramlist;
 p_first_item varchar2(20);
 p_parameter_value varchar2(32);
 p_parameter_item varchar2(20); 
 v_c1 varchar2(100);
 text_id varchar2(500);
 v_sql varchar2(500);
 v_record number;
 v_alert varchar2(1);
 v_reg_no varchar2(32);
begin
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then 
 s_alert('1','!',v_alert);
 else
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into v_reg_no;
 close c1;
 pl_id := get_parameter_list('temdata');
 if not id_null(pl_id) then
 destroy_parameter_list('temdata');
 end if;
 -- text_id := 'slip_no = '||''''||:b1pcs1005.slip_no||'''';
 -- v_sql := 'misc_type in(''TRAVEL'')';
 pl_id :=create_parameter_list('temdata');
 add_parameter(pl_id,'p_slip_no',text_parameter,:b1pcs1005.slip_no);
 add_parameter(pl_id,'p_reg_no',text_parameter,v_reg_no);
 add_parameter(pl_id,'p_source_type',text_parameter,:b1pcs1005.misc_type);
 add_parameter(pl_id,'p_supply_code',text_parameter,:b1pcs1005.supply_code);
 add_parameter(pl_id,'user_code',text_parameter,:parameter.user_code);
 call_form('odpcs167',hide,no_replace,no_query_only,pl_id); 
 go_block('b3pcs1015');
 --set_block_property('b1pcs1005',default_where,text_id);
 execute_query;
 go_block('b1pcs1005');
 --set_block_property('b1pcs1005',default_where,v_sql);
 end if;
end;

declare
 --2010.11.25 IT ITEM 29, ,.
 pl_id paramlist;
 lv_alert1 varchar2(1);
 lv_alert2 varchar2(1);
 vcount number;
 vtemp varchar2(1024);
 cursor c1 is
 select ' :'||curr
 ||' :'||nvl(amount, 0)
 ||' :'||nvl(inv_amount, 0)||chr(10) f1 
 from pcs1027
 where slip_no = :B1PCS1005.SLIP_NO
 and nvl(amount, 0) != nvl(inv_amount, 0);
begin
 vcount:=0;
 
 for c1_rec in c1 loop
 vcount:=vcount+1;
 vtemp:=vtemp||c1_rec.f1; 
 end loop;
 if vcount>0 then
 s_alert('3','!!!'||chr(10)||vtemp,lv_alert1);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 
 if round(nvl(:b2pcs1006.f_std_amount,0)) != nvl(:b3pcs1015.f_std_amt,0) and 
 :b1pcs1005.misc_sub_type in('1','2','3','4') then
 message(nvl(:b2pcs1006.f_std_amount,0)||' '|| nvl(:b3pcs1015.f_std_amt,0));
 s_alert('3','!!!, :'||:b2pcs1006.f_std_amount||
 ', :'||:b3pcs1015.f_std_amt,lv_alert1);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 

 if :b1pcs1005.slip_no is null then
 s_alert('3','!!!',lv_alert2);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 pl_id :=get_parameter_list('temdata');
 if not id_null(pl_id) then
 destroy_parameter_list('temdata');
 end if;
 pl_id :=create_parameter_list('temdata');
 add_parameter(pl_id,'paramform',text_parameter,'no');
 add_parameter(pl_id,'p_slip_no_b',text_parameter,:b1pcs1005.slip_no);

PROCEDURE P_required_item IS
/******************************************************************************************\
* creator: JENG 2000/11/16
* purpose: set required item visual attribute
*
*
*
\******************************************************************************************/
 v_first_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_LAST_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_current_item VARCHAR2(200);

 v_first_BLOCK VARCHAR2(200);
 v_LAST_BLOCK VARCHAR2(200);
 v_current_BLOCK VARCHAR2(200);

 v_current_FORM VARCHAR2(200);
 v_format varchar2(200);
BEGIN
 v_current_form := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURRENT_FORM_NAME);
 v_first_block := GET_FORM_PROPERTY(v_current_form,FIRST_BLOCK);
 v_last_block := GET_FORM_PROPERTY(v_current_form, LAST_BLOCK);

 v_current_BLOCK := v_first_block;

 LOOP -- loop blocks in form
 v_first_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block,FIRST_ITEM);
 v_last_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block, LAST_ITEM);

 v_current_item := v_first_item;
 
 LOOP -- loop items in block

 IF Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,ITEM_CANVAS) IS NOT NULL AND
 Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,ITEM_TYPE) IN ('CHAR ITEM','TEXT ITEM','LIST') THEN

 if Get_Item_property(v_current_item,DATATYPE) = 'NUMBER' then
 
 v_format := sf_glg_1006(replace(v_current_item,v_current_block||'.',''));
 
 if v_format != 'NULL' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,FORMAT_MASK,v_format);
 end if; 
 end if ;
 
 IF Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,REQUIRED)='TRUE' AND
 Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,VISIBLE)='TRUE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,PROMPT_visual_attribute,'promt_red');
 
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,PROMPT_TEXT , 'black'); 
 NULL; 
 END IF;

 END IF;

 IF v_current_item=v_last_item THEN
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 v_current_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item, NEXTITEM);
 END IF;

 END LOOP; -- loop item

 IF v_current_block=v_last_block THEN
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 v_current_block := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block, NEXTBLOCK);
 END IF;

 END LOOP; -- loop block

END; -- end of P_REQUIRED_ITEM

 is 
 v_temp varchar2(32);

END;

procedure clear_form_proc is
begin
 clear_form(no_validate);
 execute_trigger('when-new-form-instance');
end;

procedure commit_proc is
 lv_char varchar2(1);
begin
 if :system.record_status not in ('NEW') then
 enter;
 if form_failure then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 commit;
exception
 when others then
 s_alert('3',sqlerrm,lv_char);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

procedure enter_query_proc is
 cur_block varchar2(80);
 cur_va varchar2(80);
 lv_alert number;
begin
 cur_block := :system.current_block;
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 lv_alert := show_alert('alert_out');
 if lv_alert = alert_button1 then
 clear_form_proc;
 else
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 cur_va := get_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute);
 set_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute,'enter_query_va');
 enter_query;
 if cur_va is null then
 set_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute,'normal_record_va');
 else
 set_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute,cur_va);
 end if;
end;

procedure exec_query_proc is
 lv_alert number;
begin
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 lv_alert := show_alert('alert_out');
 if lv_alert = alert_button1 then
 clear_form_proc;
 execute_query;
 end if;
 else
 execute_query;
 end if;
end;

procedure exit_proc is
 alert_bun number ;
begin
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 alert_bun := show_alert('alert_out');
 if alert_bun = alert_button1 then
 exit_form(no_validate);
 end if;
 else
 exit_form;
 end if;
end;

begin
 set_item_property('save',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('enter_query',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('execute_query',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('abort_query',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('scroll_up',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('up',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('down',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('scroll_down',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('lov',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('insert',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('delete',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('dup_rec',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('clear',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('exit',enabled,property_true);

exception
 when others then
 null;
end;

Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

PROCEDURE P_SET_PAY_AMOUNT IS
cursor c_tax is
 select sum(tax_std_amount)
 from pcs1015
 where slip_no = :b1pcs1005.slip_no;
v_item_name varchar2(100):=:system.current_item;
v_block_name varchar2(200) :=:system.current_block;
v_cursor_item varchar2(200) :=:system.cursor_item;
v_tax number :=0;
v_amount number:=0;

BEGIN
-- MESSAGE('1V_CURRSOR_ITEM='||V_CURSOR_ITEM);
 :b1pcs1005.total_amt := 0;
-- message('v_item_name='||v_item_name);
 go_block('b2PCS1006');
 first_record; 
 loop
 if :b2pcs1006.dc_type = 'D' then
 v_amount := nvl(:b2pcs1006.std_amount,0);
 else
 v_amount := 0;
 end if;
 :b1pcs1005.total_amt := nvl(:b1pcs1005.total_amt,0) + nvl(v_amount,0);
 if :system.last_record ='TRUE' then 
 exit;
 else
 next_record; 
 end if; 
 end loop;
 open c_tax;
 fetch c_tax into v_tax;
 :b1pcs1005.total_amt := nvl(:b1pcs1005.total_amt,0) + nvl(v_tax,0);
 close c_tax;
 --go_ITEM(v_cursor_item);
 GO_BLOCK('B2PCS1006');
 go_record(NVL(:PARAMETER.p_record,0)+1);
 go_item('b2pcs1006.std_amount');
 /*if :system.last_record != 'TRUE' then
 NEXT_RECORD;
 end if;*/
 exception 
 when form_trigger_failure then
 go_item(v_cursor_item);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 go_item(v_cursor_item);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

procedure p_pop_list_new (p_itemname varchar2,p_codetype varchar2
 ,p_ptype varchar2) is
 group1_id recordgroup; 
 group2_id recordgroup;
 col1_id groupcolumn; 
 col2_id groupcolumn; 
 it_id item := find_item(p_itemname); 
 status number; 
 sql_temp varchar2(500);
 v_group1 varchar2(100);
 v_group2 varchar2(100);
 v_seq number := 0;
begin
-- if p_ptype = 'parameter' then
-- sql_temp := 'select parameter_value,parameter_id from pb_parameters'||
-- ' where seg_segment_no = pk_erp.f_segment_no'||
-- ' and parameter_type = '||''''||p_codetype||''''||
-- ' order by parameter_id';
-- else
 sql_temp := 'select desc_e code_value,code_id from pcs1016'||
 ' where code_type = '||''''||p_codetype||''''||
 ' order by code_id';
-- end if;


 loop
 v_group1 := p_codetype||'1'||to_char(v_seq);
 v_group2 := p_codetype||'2'||to_char(v_seq);
 group1_id := find_group(v_group1); 
 if not id_null(group1_id) then 
 v_seq := v_seq + 1;
 else 
 exit;
 end if; 
 end loop;
 group1_id := create_group(v_group1);
 col1_id := add_group_column(group1_id,'col1',char_column,50);
 col2_id := add_group_column(group1_id,'col2',char_column,50);
 add_group_row(group1_id,1); 
 add_group_row(group1_id,2);
 retrieve_list(it_id, v_group1); 
 group2_id := create_group_from_query(v_group2,sql_temp); 
 status := populate_group(v_group2);
-- show_alert_message(to_char(status));
 populate_list(it_id,v_group2);
end;

PROCEDURE P_POP_LIST(ITEM_NAME VARCHAR2,SQL_TEXT VARCHAR2) IS
 GROUP1_ID RECORDGROUP; 
 GROUP2_ID RECORDGROUP;
 COL1_ID GROUPCOLUMN; 
 COL2_ID GROUPCOLUMN; 
 IT_ID ITEM := FIND_ITEM(ITEM_NAME); 
 STATUS NUMBER; 
 SQL_TEMP VARCHAR2(500);
BEGIN
 GROUP1_ID := Find_Group('GROUP1'); 
 IF NOT Id_Null(GROUP1_ID) THEN 
 Delete_Group( GROUP1_ID ); 
 END IF; 
 GROUP1_ID := CREATE_GROUP('GROUP1');
 COL1_ID := ADD_GROUP_COLUMN(GROUP1_ID,'COL1',CHAR_COLUMN,50);
 COL2_ID := ADD_GROUP_COLUMN(GROUP1_ID,'COL2',CHAR_COLUMN,50);
 ADD_GROUP_ROW(GROUP1_ID,1); 
 ADD_GROUP_ROW(GROUP1_ID,2);
 RETRIEVE_LIST(IT_ID, 'GROUP1'); 
 GROUP2_ID := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY(REPLACE(ITEM_NAME,'.',''),SQL_TEXT); 
 STATUS := POPULATE_GROUP(REPLACE(ITEM_NAME,'.',''));
 POPULATE_LIST(IT_ID,REPLACE(ITEM_NAME,'.',''));
END;

PROCEDURE KEY_ENTQRY_PROC IS

DECLARE
 v_first_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_LAST_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_current_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_current_BLOCK VARCHAR2(200):=:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK;
 v_current_attribute VARCHAR2(200);
 v_counts INTEGER:=0;
 
 TYPE t_row IS RECORD (item VARCHAR2(200),
 visual_attribute VARCHAR2(200)
 );
 
 TYPE t_array IS TABLE OF t_row
 INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 v_array t_array;
 
BEGIN
 
 IF GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block,QUERY_ALLOWED)='FALSE' OR
 GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block,QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME) IS NULL THEN
 ENTER_QUERY;
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT, FORM_SCOPE);
 
 v_first_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block,FIRST_ITEM);
 v_last_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block, LAST_ITEM);
 v_current_item := v_first_item;
 
 LOOP -- loop items in block
--MESSAGE(v_current_item);synchronize;
 IF Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,ITEM_CANVAS) IS NOT NULL AND
 Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,ITEM_TYPE) IN ('CHAR ITEM','TEXT ITEM','LIST') AND
 Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,QUERYABLE)='TRUE' AND
 Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,VISIBLE)='TRUE' THEN
 
 v_counts:=v_counts+1;
 v_array(v_counts).item:=v_current_item;
 v_array(v_counts).visual_attribute:=GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,CURRENT_RECORD_ATTRIBUTE);
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,CURRENT_RECORD_ATTRIBUTE, 'enter_query_va');
 
 END IF;
 
 IF v_current_item=v_last_item THEN
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 v_current_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item, NEXTITEM);
 END LOOP; -- loop item
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT, DEFAULT_SCOPE);
 

 ENTER_QUERY;
 
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT, FORM_SCOPE);
 FOR i in 1..v_counts LOOP
 
 v_current_item:=v_array(i).item;
 v_current_attribute:=v_array(i).visual_attribute;
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,CURRENT_RECORD_ATTRIBUTE, v_current_attribute);
 
 END LOOP; -- loop item
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT, DEFAULT_SCOPE);
END; -- end of KEY-ENTQRY
 

end;

PROCEDURE p_payable_amt IS
BEGIN

 if :b1pcs1005.curr is null then
 :b1pcs1005.amount := null;
 else
 if :b1pcs1005.curr = sf_ars_0007 then
 :b1pcs1005.amount := nvl(:b2pcs1006.sum_std_amt,0) + nvl(:b3pcs1015.sum_tax_std_amt,0);
 elsif :b1pcs1005.curr = 'USD' then
 :b1pcs1005.amount := nvl(:b2pcs1006.sum_usd_amt,0) + nvl(:b3pcs1015.sum_tax_usd_amt,0);
 else
 :b1pcs1005.amount := nvl(:b2pcs1006.sum_amt,0) + nvl(:b3pcs1015.sum_tax_amt,0);
 end if;
 end if;

END;

procedure OPEN_EXT_FILE(p_filename varchar2) is
 v_extension varchar2(255);
 v_filetype varchar2(255);
 v_command varchar2(255);
 --v_directory varchar2(255);
begin
 --Get the file extension i.e. .doc
 v_extension := substr(p_filename, instr(p_filename, '.', -1));

 --Get the directory
 --ext_doc_dir(v_directory);

 --Get Windows file type
 -- 10g wp v_filetype := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.Read_Registry('HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\'||v_extension, null, TRUE);
 -- v_filetype := CLIENT_WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.Read_Registry('HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\'||v_extension, null, true);
 v_filetype := Win_Api_Environment.Read_Registry('HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\' || v_extension, null, true);

 --Get the associated OPEN command
 -- 10g wp v_command := CLIENT_WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.Read_Registry('HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\'||v_filetype||'\shell\open\command', null, TRUE);
 -- v_command := CLIENT_WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.Read_Registry('HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\'||v_filetype||'\shell\open\command', null, true);
 v_command := Win_Api_Environment.Read_Registry('HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\'||v_filetype||'\shell\Open\command', null, true);

 --Replace the %1 with the filename
 if instr(v_command, '%1') > 0 then
 -- v_command := replace(v_command, '%1', v_directory || p_filename);
 v_command := replace(v_command, '%1', p_filename);
 else
 --No %1 so put the file name on the end of the comman
 -- v_command := v_command || ' "' || v_directory || p_filename || '"';
 v_command := v_command || ' "' || p_filename || '"';
 end if;

 --Issue the command

 -- 10g wp WIN_API_SHELL.WinExec(v_command, WIN_API.SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE, TRUE);
 -- WEBUTIL_HOST.NONBLOCKING(v_command);
 WIN_API_SHELL.WinExec(v_command, WIN_API.SW_SHOWNORMAL, true);

end;

PROCEDURE p_get_budget_amount IS
BEGIN

 if :b2pcs1006.new_item is not null AND
 :b2pcs1006.budget_code is not null then
 select sf_pcs_0023(nvl(:b2pcs1006.month_date, :b1pcs1005.slip_date),
 :b2pcs1006.budget_code,
 :b2pcs1006.new_item)

PROCEDURE p_get_payment_term IS
 cursor c1 is
 select payment_term from pcs1012 where supply_code = :b1pcs1005.supply_code;
 r1 c1%rowtype;
BEGIN
 --2009.06.25 Rob Chang: Payment Term 12 -- 18
 if :b1pcs1005.misc_sub_type in (3,4) then
 :b1pcs1005.payment_term := '12';
 else
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into r1;
 if c1%found then
 :b1pcs1005.payment_term := r1.payment_term;
 end if;
 close c1;
 end if;

END;

FUNCTION F_DC_TYPE_AMOUNT (p_dc_type varchar2,p_net_type varchar2,p_in_amount number) RETURN number IS
 p_out_amount number;
 v_alert varchar2(1);
BEGIN
 --s_alert('1','1',v_alert);
 if p_net_type is not null then
 if p_dc_type = 'D' then
 p_out_amount := nvl(p_in_amount,0) * 1;
 elsif p_dc_type = 'C' and p_net_type = '1' then
 p_out_amount := nvl(p_in_amount,0) * -1;
 elsif p_dc_type = 'C' and p_net_type = '2' then
 p_out_amount := nvl(p_in_amount,0) * 0;
 end if;
 else
 if p_dc_type = 'D' then
 p_out_amount := nvl(p_in_amount,0) * 1;
 elsif p_dc_type = 'C' then
 p_out_amount := nvl(p_in_amount,0) * -1;
 end if;
 end if;
 return (p_out_amount);
exception
 when others then
 return(0);
END;

PROCEDURE P_SET_CURR IS
 -- 2011/06/16 add by Howard for update curr_usd_rate & usd_std_rate
 lv_alert varchar2(1);
 v_item_name varchar2(100) := :system.current_item;
 v_block_name varchar2(200) := :system.current_block;
 v_cursor_item varchar2(200) := :system.cursor_item;
 v_index number;
BEGIN
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 v_index := 0;
 go_block('B2PCS1006');
 first_record;
 loop
 v_index := v_index + 1;
 p_set_curr_1006(v_index);
 exit when (:system.last_record = 'TRUE');
 next_record;
 end loop;
 first_record;
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 v_index := 0;
 go_block('B3PCS1015');
 first_record;
 loop
 v_index := v_index + 1;
 p_set_curr_1015(v_index);
 exit when (:system.last_record = 'TRUE');
 next_record;
 end loop;
 first_record;
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 --s_alert('1',v_item_name,lv_alert);
 --s_alert('1',v_cursor_item,lv_alert);
 go_item(v_item_name);
 
exception
 when value_error then
 go_item(v_item_name);
 when others then
 s_alert('3',sqlerrm,lv_alert);
END;

PROCEDURE P_SET_CURR_1006 (p_index in number) IS
 v_alert varchar2(1);
 
BEGIN
 --s_alert('1','P_SET_CURR_1006',v_alert);
 if :b2pcs1006.curr is not null then
 /*011-08-31 End_Date sysdate */
 If trunc(:b1pcs1005.end_date) > trunc(sysdate) then--20110831 Sharon Add
 :b2pcs1006.curr_usd_rate := 0;
 :b2pcs1006.usd_std_rate := 0;
 else
 :b2pcs1006.curr_usd_rate := SF_BKS_0066('PERIOD_DAILY_E', :b2pcs1006.curr, trunc(:b1pcs1005.begin_date), trunc(:b1pcs1005.end_date));
 :b2pcs1006.usd_std_rate := SF_BKS_0066('PERIOD_DAILY_E', sf_ars_0007, trunc(:b1pcs1005.begin_date), trunc(:b1pcs1005.end_date));
 end if;
 --:b2pcs1006.curr_usd_rate := 0;
 --:b2pcs1006.usd_std_rate := 0;
 ----20110901 
 /*if :b2pcs1006.curr != sf_ars_0007 and
 (nvl(:b2pcs1006.curr_usd_rate,0) = 0 or nvl(:b2pcs1006.usd_std_rate,0) = 0) then
 if p_index is not null then
 s_alert('3',''||p_index||','||to_char(:b1pcs1005.begin_date,'YYYYMMDD')||'~'||to_char(:b1pcs1005.end_date,'YYYYMMDD')||' , call ',v_alert);
 else
 s_alert('3',to_char(:b1pcs1005.begin_date,'YYYYMMDD')||'~'||to_char(:b1pcs1005.end_date,'YYYYMMDD')||' , call ',v_alert);
 end if;
 --s_alert('3',:system.cursor_item,v_alert);
 if :system.cursor_item = 'B2PCS1006.DC_TYPE' then
 raise value_error;
 end if;
 end if;*/
 
 if :b2pcs1006.amount is not null then
 if nvl(:b2pcs1006.curr_usd_rate,0) = 0 or nvl(:b2pcs1006.usd_std_rate,0) = 0 then
 :b2pcs1006.usd_amount := null;
 if :b2pcs1006.curr = sf_ars_0007 then
 :b2pcs1006.amount := round(:b2pcs1006.amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_0007));
 :b2pcs1006.std_amount := :b2pcs1006.amount;
 else
 :b2pcs1006.std_amount := null;
 end if;
 else
 :b2pcs1006.usd_amount:=round(nvl(:b2pcs1006.amount,0)/:b2pcs1006.curr_usd_rate,sf_ars_0008('USD'));
 if :b2pcs1006.curr != sf_ars_0007 then
 :b2pcs1006.std_amount:=round(:b2pcs1006.usd_std_rate*:b2pcs1006.usd_amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_0007));
 elsif :b2pcs1006.curr = sf_ars_0007 then
 :b2pcs1006.amount:=round(:b2pcs1006.amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_0007));
 :b2pcs1006.std_amount:=round(:b2pcs1006.amount,sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_0007));
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;

 end if;

END;

PROCEDURE P_SET_CURR_1015 (p_index in number) IS
 v_alert varchar2(1);
BEGIN
 if :b3pcs1015.curr is not null then
 If trunc(:b1pcs1005.end_date) > trunc(sysdate) then
 :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate := 0;
 else
 :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate := SF_BKS_0066('PERIOD_DAILY_E', :b3pcs1015.curr, trunc(:b1pcs1005.begin_date), trunc(:b1pcs1005.end_date));
 :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate := SF_BKS_0066('PERIOD_DAILY_E', sf_ars_0007, trunc(:b1pcs1005.begin_date), trunc(:b1pcs1005.end_date));
 end if;
 --:b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate := 0;
 --:b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate := 0;
 -- --20110901
 /*
 if :b3pcs1015.curr != sf_ars_0007 and
 (nvl(:b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate,0) = 0 or nvl(:b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate,0) = 0) then
 if p_index is not null then
 s_alert('3',''||p_index||','||to_char(:b1pcs1005.begin_date,'YYYYMMDD')||'~'||to_char(:b1pcs1005.end_date,'YYYYMMDD')||' , call ',v_alert);
 else
 s_alert('3',to_char(:b1pcs1005.begin_date,'YYYYMMDD')||'~'||to_char(:b1pcs1005.end_date,'YYYYMMDD')||' , call ',v_alert);
 end if;
 --s_alert('3',:system.cursor_item,v_alert);
 if :system.cursor_item = 'B3PCS1015.ADD_TYPE' then
 raise value_error;
 end if;
 end if;*/
 
 if :b3pcs1015.amount is not null then
 if :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate = 0 or :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate is null or :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate = 0 or :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate is null then
 :b3pcs1015.usd_amount := null;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := null;
 if :b3pcs1015.curr = sf_ars_0007 then
 :b3pcs1015.std_amount := :b3pcs1015.amount;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(:b3pcs1015.curr));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount := :b3pcs1015.tax_amount;
 elsif :b3pcs1015.curr != sf_ars_0007 then
 :b3PCS1015.std_amount := null;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount := null;
 :b3PCS1015.tax_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(:b3pcs1015.curr));
 end if;
 else
 :b3pcs1015.usd_amount := round(nvl(:b3pcs1015.amount,0) / nvl(:b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate,1),sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('EX_CURR')));
 :b3pcs1015.std_amount := round(nvl(:b3pcs1015.usd_amount,0) * nvl(:b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate,0),0);
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.amount*nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),0),sf_ars_0008(:b3pcs1015.curr));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.usd_amount * nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('EX_CURR'))));
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount := round(:b3pcs1015.std_amount * nvl(sf_pcs_0014(:b3pcs1015.cut_type,'TAX_TYPE',:b3pcs1015.tax_type),sf_ars_0008(sf_ars_1001('STD_CURR'))));
 end if;
 end if;
 
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type is not null then
 if :b3pcs1015.invoice_type in ('RECEIPT') then
 if :b3pcs1015.curr_usd_rate is not null and :b3pcs1015.usd_std_rate is not null then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount:= 0;
 else
 if :b3pcs1015.curr = sf_ars_0007 then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount := :b3pcs1015.tax_amount;
 elsif :b3pcs1015.curr != sf_ars_0007 then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount := 0;
 end if;
 end if; 
 elsif :b3pcs1015.invoice_type in ('ABROAD_RECEIPT') then
 :b3pcs1015.tax_std_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_amount := 0;
 :b3pcs1015.tax_usd_amount := 0;
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 
END;

begin 


--ARGO MICHAEL 2000/11/22
P_REQUIRED_ITEM;
p_pop_list_new('b1pcs1005.misc_sub_type','TRAVEL_TYPE',null);
 p_pop_list('b3pcs1015.area_code',
 'select desc_c,
 code_id 
 from pcs1016
 where code_type=''AREA_CODE''

 ); 

 p_pop_list('b3pcs1015.invoice_type',
 'select desc_c,

 );

 :parameter.p_invoice_type := 'INVOICE';
 begin
 select sf_pcs_0096(:parameter.user_code)
 into :parameter.p_place_code
 from dual;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 null;
 end; 
exception
 when others then
 message(sqlerrm);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

declare
 cursor c1 is
 select '*'
 from pcs1006 a
 where a.slip_no = :b1pcs1005.slip_no
 and a.dc_type = 'C'
 and a.net_type = '1'
 and not exists(select '*'
 from pcs1006 b
 where a.slip_no = b.slip_no
 and a.curr = b.curr
 and nvl(a.curr_usd_rate,1) = nvl(b.curr_usd_rate,1)
 and nvl(a.usd_std_rate,1) = nvl(b.usd_std_rate,1)
 and b.dc_type = 'D');
v_c1 varchar2(10);
v_char varchar2(10);
begin
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into v_c1;
 if c1%found then
 s_alert('3','0',v_char);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 --20110926 mark by sharon
 --Rob Ask:, , , ,

 s_alert('3',',user',v_char);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 --End Add for 2011FIN015-*/
end;
